hero.title: Create a Test in Seconds
hero.subtitle: ✨ Leverage the power of AI to create interactive quiz content from simple requests. 🚀 Perfect for teachers 👩‍🏫, content creators 🎨, and curious minds 🧠💭.
hero.placeholder: Enter a topic for your quiz (e.g., 'Solar System', 'World War II')

quizForm.title: Create Quiz
quizForm.placeholder: Enter a topic for your quiz (e.g., 'Solar System', 'World War II')
quizForm.helpDescription: Create a quiz easily with these parameters:
quizForm.numberHelp: Enter the number of questions you want to generate (maximum 25 questions)
quizForm.difficultyHelp: Enter the difficulty level of the quiz (easy, medium, hard)
quizForm.exampleDescription: Generate 10 questions about renewable energy, medium difficulty.

1.title: Diverse Categories 📚
1.description: Explore hundreds of engaging quizzes on countless topics from science 🔬, history 🏛️, literature 📖 to technology 💻 and entertainment 🎮!

2.title: Real-time Results ⚡
2.description: Get instant feedback on your answers with detailed analysis and smart learning suggestions 🧠. No waiting, results appear instantly! 🚀

3.title: Challenge Friends 🏆
3.description: Create fun competition rooms 🎮, invite friends to join, compete intellectually and track the competitive leaderboard 📊. Who will win today? 🥇

quiz.title: Quiz
quiz.error: An error occurred while loading the quiz

exam.title: Exam
exam.error: Failed to load exam. Please try again later.
exam.question: Question
exam.cantChangeAnswers: Note: You can't change your answers after submission

quizCreate.title: Create Quiz
quizCreate.description:
✨ Enter an interesting topic for your quiz (e.g., 'Solar System 🪐', 'Wildlife 🦁') and click 'Create Quiz' to start the magic!

🚀 In just seconds, you'll have an amazing quiz for fun learning, challenging your brain 🧠 or sharing with friends for an exciting knowledge adventure!

🎮 Get ready to learn while playing, play while learning! 🎉
quizCreate.editModeDocument: 🎮 Hey! ✏️ Here, you can enable customization mode for quiz titles and descriptions as you like. 🔄 Feel free to get creative by editing, adding, deleting, or rearranging questions easily! 🎯 Adjust answer options, change correct answers, and enrich your explanations. ✨ When you've completed your masterpiece, click Save Changes to save your work! 🚀

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this quiz?
dashboard.confirmBulkDeleteDesc: Are you sure you want to delete the selected quizzes?
dashboard.confirmBulkStatusUpdateDesc: Are you sure you want to update the status of the selected quizzes?

Changelog.updateInfo: We regularly update Quizzz Gen AI with new features, improvements, and bug fixes. Check back here to see what's new!
